reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater stylish, soft, and comfortable, particularly noting it's not itchy at all.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect sweater
items.body: Beautiful! Just as pictured. Accurate size and fit. The material is think but not to heavy very comfortable. I received so many compliments when I wore it. Read more
items.author: Michelle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Winter sweater
items.body: Just a beautiful sweater! Love the colors and the feel! My new favorite! Read more
items.author: paula

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable, love the sleeves, roomier than expected
items.body: I have two of these now (the khaki and the black) and have worn them multiple times. They are very comfortable, lightweight but warm, and nice looking. The shape of the sleeves is what initially attracted me. I love that they are loose in the arm but cuffed at the bottom. Most sweaters I find are too tight around my arms and hang way down over my hand, but these are comfortable around the arms and just tapered enough at the wrists to keep the sleeves up above my hand. Beware they are generously loose. I have worn a medium (8) for many years, so the first one I ordered is a medium. It's overly large, but I'm wearing it anyway. The second one is a small, which is much better, and stills fits as loosely as you see on the model. The only reason I rated as a 4 instead of 5 is that the stripes on both of mine are very slightly crooked. Most people would never ever notice, I just happen to be very picky about things lining up properly. I would recommend and purchase again. Read more
items.author: Carrie W.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft and warm
items.body: Oversized but not to the point of being ‘too much’ I normally wear a medium but the small would a worked. Very soft and has washed well. The pink is a nice pop of color on dreary days. Read more
items.author: Gina W.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish
items.body: Quality and style at an affordable price! Read more
items.author: Mariann M Vann

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Holiday sweater !
items.body: love it ! Color is beautiful and great fit . Cozy sweater. Read more
items.author: Mayra Ramos

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Soft, but Colors appear different than pictured.
items.body: This sweater is definitely very soft. The pictures show this having a heathered look to the color and that is not the case. Colors are saturated and solid, not heathered. Not sure I am keeping this for that reason. Read more
items.author: AMY GANZEL

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Cute but not made well
items.body: It is a super cute sweater, very soft and true to size. However, it balls up very bad after just one wash and I did delicate and then air dried it. The sleeves also started to unravel after just one delicate wash. Unfortunately I cannot request a return because it is too late otherwise I would. Read more
items.author: Stacia Gerard

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 80 Rose Red, 2143 Brown Khaki, Blue, 80 Blue, Black, 80 Grey, 80 Orange, 2077 Black, 80 Brown, Khaki, 2076 Grey, 2076 Khaki, Yellow, 2143 Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
